description: Configuration management using Pydantic settings with support for development, testing, and production environments
Database connection management with async SQLAlchemy engine and session factory
SQLAlchemy User ORM model with id, username, email, hashed_password, is_active, created_at, updated_at, last_login fields
Pydantic schemas for API requests/responses (UserRegister, UserLogin, UserResponse, TokenResponse)
JWT token creation and validation utilities with support for access and refresh tokens
Password hashing and verification using passlib with bcrypt algorithm
Centralized structured logging configuration using Python logging with JSON formatter
Circuit breaker implementation with three states (Closed, Open, Half-Open) for fault tolerance
Custom exception hierarchy for authentication, validation, database, and circuit breaker errors
Middleware to add unique request ID to all requests and include in logs
Global exception handler middleware that catches all exceptions and returns consistent error response
Dependency injection utilities: get_db(), get_current_user(), get_logger()
User management service with operations: create_user, get_user_by_email, get_user_by_id, get_user_by_username
Authentication business logic: register_user, login_user, refresh_access_token with validation and token generation
Health check endpoint for service availability verification
Authentication endpoints: POST /api/auth/register, POST /api/auth/login, POST /api/auth/refresh
FastAPI application initialization with middleware setup, route registration, and OpenAPI/Swagger configuration
Pytest configuration and fixtures for testing (test database, test user, test tokens, async client)
Unit tests for AuthService: register, login, token validation, error cases
Unit tests for UserService: create_user, get_user_by_email/id/username, error cases
Unit tests for JWT utilities: token creation, validation, expiration, invalid tokens
Unit tests for password utilities: hashing and verification
Unit tests for circuit breaker: state transitions, failure tracking, recovery
Unit tests for exception classes: proper initialization, error codes, status codes
Integration tests for auth endpoints: register, login, refresh, error cases
Integration tests for health check endpoint
Integration tests for middleware: request ID, logging, exception handling, CORS
Integration tests for OpenAPI/Swagger documentation availability and content
Python package dependencies for the project
Template file showing required environment variables
Pytest configuration with asyncio mode and test discovery settings
